backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining marketplace types, storage maps, and authorization logic with initial admin setup and vendor/admin helper checks.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old actor state to the new format, including list-to-array conversions and vendor/order structure upgrades.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to corresponding frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of many frontend files describing UI pages, components, styling, and behavior.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment notes detailing fixes for production build issues related to Vite environment variables and missing configuration files.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS variables and theming definitions for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point setting metadata, loading the manifest, and mounting the React root.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, theme colors, and display behavior.
frontend/public/offline.html: Standalone offline fallback page with gradient styling and a retry button.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker handling precaching, cache cleanup, and network-first or cache-first fetching with offline fallback.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app router defining all frontend routes with role-based protection and shared layout.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminError: Error boundary for admin pages that logs diagnostics and shows a styled fallback UI when rendering fails.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminNav.t: Admin navigation tabs component linking to dashboard, vendors, orders, and products sections.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: App layout component rendering top navigation, content area, and bottom navigation.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays an access-denied message with optional admin tools, backend error diagnostics, and refresh actions.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminBypass: Wrapper that requires authentication for admin routes and redirects unauthenticated users to the login page.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button that triggers Internet Identity authentication and manages query cache.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting authenticated users without a profile to create one using basic personal details.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireRole: Role-based gatekeeper that checks admin/vendor/customer status and shows loading or denial screens accordingly.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Bottom navigation bar that switches items based on user role and shows cart counts.
frontend/src/components/buttons/PrimaryC: Wrapper around Button applying a primary CTA gradient style.
frontend/src/components/DealCard.tsx: Card component displaying a product with image, deal badge, pricing, and discount handling.
frontend/src/components/forms/FloatingLa: Floating input component combining an Input and Label with animated floating label behavior.
frontend/src/components/HeroBannerSlider: Auto-rotating hero banner slider with navigation buttons and slide indicators.
frontend/src/components/ProductGrid.tsx: Product grid list showing products with pricing, stock badges, images, and add‑to‑cart handling.
frontend/src/components/status/OrderStat: Badge component that displays order status using style and text helpers.
frontend/src/components/TopNav.tsx: Responsive top navigation bar with search, cart count, role-based links, and login handling.
frontend/src/data/vendors.ts: Static vendor list and interface defining vendor fields like shop name and location.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorQueryState.ts: Hook that reads actor query state from React Query cache without triggering actor creation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity auth provider and hook handling login, stored identity, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, roles, and other backend data.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with custom color system, themes, utilities, and global styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React Query and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Marketing about page describing QuickBazar with feature cards and styled sections.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Renders the admin dashboard with navigation cards for vendor management, orders, and quick administrative actions.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Shows all orders with filtering by city and allows admins to update order statuses.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Provides an admin interface to list, create, edit, and delete products using a modal form.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminVendorsPag: Displays vendor list with actions to approve, reject, toggle outlet status, and view vendor documents.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays the shopping cart, merges cart items with product data, calculates totals, and handles checkout navigation with identity checks.
frontend/src/pages/CategoriesPage.tsx: Fetches and lists all categories with loading skeletons, showing each as a clickable card with styled icons.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryListingPage.t: Shows products filtered by category with sorting options and uses ProductGrid to display results.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Builds an order summary from cart items, calculates totals, and submits a new order while clearing the cart on success.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders a contact form with validation and simulated submission plus static contact info cards.
frontend/src/pages/customer/CustomerProf: Shows the logged‑in customer’s profile details including principal ID, name, email, phone, and address.
frontend/src/pages/customer/OrdersPage.t: Displays a customer's orders with loading state, empty state, and order cards showing status, date, items, and total.
frontend/src/pages/customer/WishlistPage: Fetches and displays wishlist items with loading skeletons, empty state, product cards, images, discounts, and stock badges.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home landing page with hero slider, login buttons, deals section, and feature highlights using fetched products.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/CustomerLo: Provides a customer login form with validation, storing data, and navigating to the vendor list based on selected city.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/OutletDeta: Collects outlet details with photo upload, validation, and saves data before navigating to the vendor dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/SimpleVend: Shows a simple vendor dashboard with registration success info, outlet data, and vendor contact/location details.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/VendorList: Lists vendors filtered by city with empty state handling and navigation to individual vendor shops.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/VendorLogi: Form page for vendor login collecting basic details with validation and navigation to outlet details.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/VendorShop: Displays vendor shop info based on vendorId, showing location and contact or a not-found state.
frontend/src/pages/ProductPage.tsx: Displays a product detail page with image carousel, pricing, availability, add‑to‑cart, and review submission features.
frontend/src/pages/vendor/VendorDashboar: Vendor dashboard showing wallet due, sales, outlet info, and status using data from backend queries.
frontend/src/pages/vendor/VendorOrdersPa: Lists vendor orders with status, details, and empty/loading states using backend query data.
frontend/src/pages/vendor/VendorProducts: Manages vendor products with add, edit, delete dialogs, syncing updates through backend hooks.
frontend/src/utils/categoryColors.ts: Maps category IDs to deterministic gradient color classes using a simple hash.
frontend/src/utils/categoryMatch.ts: Provides case-insensitive lookup of categories by name.
frontend/src/utils/errors.ts: Utilities to extract, format, and display friendly error messages and diagnostics.
frontend/src/utils/formatInr.ts: Formats numeric or bigint amounts into INR currency strings.
frontend/src/utils/onboardingStorage.ts: Provides functions to save, retrieve, and clear customer, vendor, and outlet onboarding data in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/safeNumbers.ts: Contains safe numeric conversion, formatting, and sanitization helpers to prevent rendering errors.
frontend/src/utils/statusStyles.ts: Maps order and UI statuses to display text and CSS class names, and computes stock availability styling.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and removing URL parameters using query strings, hash, and sessionStorage.
frontend/src/vite-env.d.ts: Defines Vite environment variable typings for the project.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, animations, and plugins including typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s state, existing features, and requested enhancements for the admin control panel.
